attributes.comment:
I ask that you please reconsider your fee increases for peitions to adopt an
orphan. The current wait times for several countries, China specifically, have
increased so dramatically that it is possible that many adoptive families will have
to re-file the same application two to three times and be re-fingerprinted the same
number of times before finalizing adoption. The financial burden involved in this is
too much. The 18 month expiration on the I-171H needs to be extended or waived
in order to prevent families from having to pay the US government more money to
process the same paperwork twice. If the reason for fee increases is to streamline
the process then I suggest you streamline the process first to take the burden of
work off the government by having to re-process the same paperwork twice!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Emily J. Charlton
